system:
note description: "Eiffel Vision color. Gtk implementation%NBoth REAL and 16 bit INTEGER values are stored%Nas attributes and kept up to date." legal: "See notice at end of class." status: "See notice at end of class." keywords: "color, pixel, rgb, 8, 16, 24" date: "$Date: 2017-03-27 13:31:29 -0700 (Mon, 27 Mar 2017) $" revision: "$Revision: 100058 $"
class ../implementation_gtk/ev_color_imp.xmlEV_COLOR_IMP
inherit ../implementation_interface/ev_color_i.xmlEV_COLOR_I redefine ../implementation_gtk/ev_color_imp.xml#f_interfaceinterface, ../implementation_gtk/ev_color_imp.xml#f_set_with_otherset_with_other end
create ../implementation_gtk/ev_color_imp.xml#f_makemake
feature {NONE} -- Initialization
f_old_make../implementation_gtk/ev_color_imp.xml#f_old_makeold_make (an_interface: attached like ../implementation_gtk/ev_color_imp.xml#f_interfaceinterface) -- Create zero intensity color. do ../implementation_interface/ev_any_i.xml#f_assign_interfaceassign_interface (an_interface) end
f_make../implementation_gtk/ev_color_imp.xml#f_makemake -- Do nothing. do ../implementation_gtk/ev_color_imp.xml#f_namename := ../implementation_interface/ev_color_i.xml#f_default_nameDefault_name.Falsetwin ../implementation_interface/ev_any_i.xml#f_set_is_initializedset_is_initialized (True) end
feature -- Access
f_red../implementation_gtk/ev_color_imp.xml#f_redred: FalseREAL_32 -- Intensity of red component. -- Range: [0,1]
f_green../implementation_gtk/ev_color_imp.xml#f_greengreen: FalseREAL_32 -- Intensity of green component. -- Range: [0,1]
f_blue../implementation_gtk/ev_color_imp.xml#f_blueblue: FalseREAL_32 -- Intensity of blue component. -- Range: [0,1]
f_name../implementation_gtk/ev_color_imp.xml#f_namename: FalseSTRING_32 -- A textual description.
feature -- Element change
f_set_red../implementation_gtk/ev_color_imp.xml#f_set_redset_red (a_red: FalseREAL_32) -- Assign a_red to ../implementation_gtk/ev_color_imp.xml#f_redred. do ../implementation_gtk/ev_color_imp.xml#f_redred := a_red ../implementation_gtk/ev_color_imp.xml#f_red_16_bitred_16_bit := (a_red * 65535.Falseto_real).Falserounded end
f_set_green../implementation_gtk/ev_color_imp.xml#f_set_greenset_green (a_green: FalseREAL_32) -- Assign a_green to ../implementation_gtk/ev_color_imp.xml#f_greengreen. do ../implementation_gtk/ev_color_imp.xml#f_greengreen := a_green ../implementation_gtk/ev_color_imp.xml#f_green_16_bitgreen_16_bit := (a_green * 65535.Falseto_real).Falserounded end
f_set_blue../implementation_gtk/ev_color_imp.xml#f_set_blueset_blue (a_blue: FalseREAL_32) -- Assign a_blue to ../implementation_gtk/ev_color_imp.xml#f_blueblue. do ../implementation_gtk/ev_color_imp.xml#f_blueblue := a_blue ../implementation_gtk/ev_color_imp.xml#f_blue_16_bitblue_16_bit := (a_blue * 65535.Falseto_real).Falserounded end
f_set_name../implementation_gtk/ev_color_imp.xml#f_set_nameset_name (a_name: FalseREADABLE_STRING_GENERAL) -- Assign a_name to ../implementation_gtk/ev_color_imp.xml#f_namename. do ../implementation_gtk/ev_color_imp.xml#f_namename.Falsewipe_out ../implementation_gtk/ev_color_imp.xml#f_namename.Falseappend_string_general (a_name) end
feature -- Conversion
f_rgb_24_bit../implementation_gtk/ev_color_imp.xml#f_rgb_24_bitrgb_24_bit: FalseINTEGER_32 -- ../implementation_gtk/ev_color_imp.xml#f_redred, ../implementation_gtk/ev_color_imp.xml#f_greengreen and ../implementation_gtk/ev_color_imp.xml#f_blueblue intensities packed into 24 bits -- with 8 bits per colour and blue in the least significant 8 bits. do Result := (../implementation_gtk/ev_color_imp.xml#f_red_8_bitred_8_bit * 65536) + (../implementation_gtk/ev_color_imp.xml#f_green_8_bitgreen_8_bit * 256) + ../implementation_gtk/ev_color_imp.xml#f_blue_8_bitblue_8_bit end
f_set_rgb_with_24_bit../implementation_gtk/ev_color_imp.xml#f_set_rgb_with_24_bitset_rgb_with_24_bit (a_24_bit_rgb: FalseINTEGER_32) -- Set intensities from a_24_bit_rgb value -- with red in the most significant bits and blue in the least. local l_int: FalseINTEGER_32 do l_int := a_24_bit_rgb // 65536 ../implementation_gtk/ev_color_imp.xml#f_set_red_with_16_bitset_red_with_16_bit (l_int * 257) if l_int /= 0 then l_int := a_24_bit_rgb // 256 \\ (l_int * 256) else l_int := a_24_bit_rgb // 256 end ../implementation_gtk/ev_color_imp.xml#f_set_green_with_16_bitset_green_with_16_bit (l_int * 257) l_int := a_24_bit_rgb // 256 * 256 if l_int /= 0 then l_int := a_24_bit_rgb \\ l_int else l_int := a_24_bit_rgb end ../implementation_gtk/ev_color_imp.xml#f_set_blue_with_16_bitset_blue_with_16_bit (l_int * 257) end
f_red_8_bit../implementation_gtk/ev_color_imp.xml#f_red_8_bitred_8_bit: FalseINTEGER_32 -- Intensity of ../implementation_gtk/ev_color_imp.xml#f_redred component -- as an 8 bit unsigned integer. -- Range [0,255] do Result := (../implementation_gtk/ev_color_imp.xml#f_redred * 255.Falseto_real).Falserounded end
f_green_8_bit../implementation_gtk/ev_color_imp.xml#f_green_8_bitgreen_8_bit: FalseINTEGER_32 -- Intensity of ../implementation_gtk/ev_color_imp.xml#f_greengreen component -- as an 8 bit unsigned integer. -- Range [0,255] do Result := (../implementation_gtk/ev_color_imp.xml#f_greengreen * 255.Falseto_real).Falserounded end
f_blue_8_bit../implementation_gtk/ev_color_imp.xml#f_blue_8_bitblue_8_bit: FalseINTEGER_32 -- Intensity of ../implementation_gtk/ev_color_imp.xml#f_blueblue component -- as an 8 bit unsigned integer. -- Range [0,255] do Result := (../implementation_gtk/ev_color_imp.xml#f_blueblue * 255.Falseto_real).Falserounded end
f_set_red_with_8_bit../implementation_gtk/ev_color_imp.xml#f_set_red_with_8_bitset_red_with_8_bit (an_8_bit_red: FalseINTEGER_32) -- Set ../implementation_gtk/ev_color_imp.xml#f_redred from an_8_bit_red intinsity. do ../implementation_gtk/ev_color_imp.xml#f_set_red_with_16_bitset_red_with_16_bit (an_8_bit_red * 257) end
f_set_green_with_8_bit../implementation_gtk/ev_color_imp.xml#f_set_green_with_8_bitset_green_with_8_bit (an_8_bit_green: FalseINTEGER_32) -- Set ../implementation_gtk/ev_color_imp.xml#f_greengreen from an_8_bit_green intinsity. do ../implementation_gtk/ev_color_imp.xml#f_set_green_with_16_bitset_green_with_16_bit (an_8_bit_green * 257) end
f_set_blue_with_8_bit../implementation_gtk/ev_color_imp.xml#f_set_blue_with_8_bitset_blue_with_8_bit (an_8_bit_blue: FalseINTEGER_32) -- Set ../implementation_gtk/ev_color_imp.xml#f_blueblue from an_8_bit_blue intinsity. do ../implementation_gtk/ev_color_imp.xml#f_set_blue_with_16_bitset_blue_with_16_bit (an_8_bit_blue * 257) end
f_red_16_bit../implementation_gtk/ev_color_imp.xml#f_red_16_bitred_16_bit: FalseINTEGER_32 -- Intensity of red component -- as a 16 bit unsigned integer. -- Range [0,65535]
f_green_16_bit../implementation_gtk/ev_color_imp.xml#f_green_16_bitgreen_16_bit: FalseINTEGER_32 -- Intensity of green component -- as a 16 bit unsigned integer. -- Range [0,65535]
f_blue_16_bit../implementation_gtk/ev_color_imp.xml#f_blue_16_bitblue_16_bit: FalseINTEGER_32 -- Intensity of blue component -- as a 16 bit unsigned integer. -- Range [0,65535]
f_set_red_with_16_bit../implementation_gtk/ev_color_imp.xml#f_set_red_with_16_bitset_red_with_16_bit (a_16_bit_red: FalseINTEGER_32) -- Set ../implementation_gtk/ev_color_imp.xml#f_redred from a_8_bit_red intinsity. do ../implementation_gtk/ev_color_imp.xml#f_red_16_bitred_16_bit := a_16_bit_red ../implementation_gtk/ev_color_imp.xml#f_redred := (a_16_bit_red / 65535).Falsetruncated_to_real end
f_set_green_with_16_bit../implementation_gtk/ev_color_imp.xml#f_set_green_with_16_bitset_green_with_16_bit (a_16_bit_green: FalseINTEGER_32) -- Set ../implementation_gtk/ev_color_imp.xml#f_greengreen from a_16_bit_green intinsity. do ../implementation_gtk/ev_color_imp.xml#f_green_16_bitgreen_16_bit := a_16_bit_green ../implementation_gtk/ev_color_imp.xml#f_greengreen := (a_16_bit_green / 65535).Falsetruncated_to_real end
f_set_blue_with_16_bit../implementation_gtk/ev_color_imp.xml#f_set_blue_with_16_bitset_blue_with_16_bit (a_16_bit_blue: FalseINTEGER_32) -- Set ../implementation_gtk/ev_color_imp.xml#f_blueblue from a_16_bit_blue intinsity. do ../implementation_gtk/ev_color_imp.xml#f_blue_16_bitblue_16_bit := a_16_bit_blue ../implementation_gtk/ev_color_imp.xml#f_blueblue := (a_16_bit_blue / 65535).Falsetruncated_to_real end
f_set_with_other../implementation_gtk/ev_color_imp.xml#f_set_with_otherset_with_other (other: ../interface/ev_color.xmlEV_COLOR) -- Take on the appearance of other. local imp: detachable ../implementation_gtk/ev_color_imp.xmlEV_COLOR_IMP do imp ?= other.../interface/ev_color.xml#f_implementationimplementation check imp_not_void: imp /= Void then end ../implementation_gtk/ev_color_imp.xml#f_red_16_bitred_16_bit := imp.../implementation_gtk/ev_color_imp.xml#f_red_16_bitred_16_bit ../implementation_gtk/ev_color_imp.xml#f_green_16_bitgreen_16_bit := imp.../implementation_gtk/ev_color_imp.xml#f_green_16_bitgreen_16_bit ../implementation_gtk/ev_color_imp.xml#f_blue_16_bitblue_16_bit := imp.../implementation_gtk/ev_color_imp.xml#f_blue_16_bitblue_16_bit ../implementation_gtk/ev_color_imp.xml#f_redred := imp.../implementation_gtk/ev_color_imp.xml#f_redred ../implementation_gtk/ev_color_imp.xml#f_greengreen := imp.../implementation_gtk/ev_color_imp.xml#f_greengreen ../implementation_gtk/ev_color_imp.xml#f_blueblue := imp.../implementation_gtk/ev_color_imp.xml#f_blueblue end
feature {../implementation_interface/ev_any_i.xmlEV_ANY_I} -- Command
f_delta../implementation_gtk/ev_color_imp.xml#f_deltadelta: FalseREAL_32 -- Amount by which two intensities can differ but still be -- considered equal by Falseis_equal. do Result := {FalseREAL_32} 1.0 / {FalseREAL_32} 255.0 end
f_destroy../implementation_gtk/ev_color_imp.xml#f_destroydestroy -- Render Current unusable. do ../implementation_interface/ev_any_i.xml#f_set_is_destroyedset_is_destroyed (True) end
feature {../implementation_interface/ev_any_i.xmlEV_ANY_I, FalseANY} -- Implementation
f_interface../implementation_gtk/ev_color_imp.xml#f_interfaceinterface: detachable ../interface/ev_color.xmlEV_COLOR note option: stable attribute end
note copyright: "Copyright (c) 1984-2017, Eiffel Software and others" license: "Eiffel Forum License v2 (see http://www.eiffel.com/licensing/forum.txthttp://www.eiffel.com/licensing/forum.txt)" source: "[ Eiffel Software 5949 Hollister Ave., Goleta, CA 93117 USA Telephone 805-685-1006, Fax 805-685-6869 Website http://www.eiffel.comhttp://www.eiffel.com Customer support http://support.eiffel.comhttp://support.eiffel.com ]"
end -- class ../implementation_gtk/ev_color_imp.xmlEV_COLOR_IMP
